description: メッセージに繰り返しテキストを送信するユーザーを認可するモジュールです。

enable.description: 反復テキストモジュールを有効にします。

action.description: Set the action to take when someone sends repeated text in a message.

action.name: action
action.description: Action to take when someone sends repeated text in a message.

time.name: time
time.description: Time of the action (in case of being temporary).

channel.description: Add or remove a channel from the list of ignored channels.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel from the module's channel bypass list.

role.description: Add or remove a role from the list of ignored roles.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

role.name: role
role.description: Role from the module's role bypass list.

docs.description: Get the link of the anti-repeated-text module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the anti-repeated-text module.

reset.description: モジュールの設定を元に戻す (データの復旧はできません)。

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
